answerText: enzymes[10] This parameter in the Michaelis-Menten theory gives the concentration of substrate at which a particular enzyme is at one-half of its maximum velocity.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 4 | 14 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These proteins often have an induced-fit when their substrate binds to the active site. [10] Name these proteins that catalyze biological reactions. Catalase is thought to be the fastest one, and the Michaelis-Menten theory is used to describe their kinetics.
